data.text:
Our stay at the hotel was amazing. Staff is so warm, welcoming and kind. All of them made our stay incrediable.
We appreciate the most service from Joseph (restaurant) who was so nice with our baby, had high hospitality level, was so friendly but professional at the same time.
Also there are Norhaina from the Front desk, and Faiza from the restaurant, they were patient, friendly, kind and so nice to us.
Thanks to all of them and the rest of the staff, we wish to come back in November.
data.title: Amazing family vacation

data.text: Very nice stay in adagio! Every morning me and my girlfriend went for a coffee. The service of Nang was very good. A very polite woman who helped us every morning! This will definitely influence our choice of hotel for the next trip. We looking foreward to come back to dubai and to the adagio hotel!
data.title: Perfect stay at adagio

data.text:
Honestly the best hotel experience ever ! 
The staff are AMAZING, the food is so good , the rooms , the pool , the beach üòçüòç

Everything about this hotel is perfection, I could say so many good things about it. 
Would definitely recommend for anyone to come and stay here :) we definitely will be returning and already are looking into coming back !  The food in the hotel is a very high standard and cannot fault one meal served from our 10 night stay.

The staff are excellent,  extremely helpful and will go above and beyond for you even with little details like just chatting the best activity‚Äôs to do in Dubai. All the staff definitely need a massive pat on the back for all the hard work they do ! As they are big reason why we have loved our stay and can‚Äôt wait to come back , especially the staff in the restaurant including - Owen, Parvees, Han, Faiz, Anne, Joseph, Nang, Abdulah as well as Muhammads bookings for all the experiences which is located in reception.

Thank you for making our trip to Dubai so wonderful and amazing, Can‚Äôt wait to come back!üëç
data.title: THE BEST !! The staff are amazing !!!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 930cerysd,

Thank you so much for your genuine and refreshing review reflecting every aspect that impressed you during your recent stay with us. 
It gives us immense pleasure and sense of pride to read from a thoroughly satisfied guest, please accept our heartfelt gratitude for your kind words of appreciation about the hotel facilities, food  and our pool and beach facility.
Your kind words for all our team have been shared so everyone knows how they contributed to making your stay memorable.
We hope you will find a reason to return to stay with us very soon. We will look forward to making you 'Feel Welcome'

Sincerely,
Hani Essmat
Front Office Manager
Adagio Premium the Palm
owner_response.author: Norhaina  Khalid

data.text:
I had absolutely the most enjoyable time here. The service is outstanding. Rohit, Asma and Edgar our room service team made our stay worry free and clean. I mean, we did not even have to worry about asking them for service, everything was done with 10 out of 5 stars.
The beach is so clean and literally it takes 2 minutes to get there. 
The stuff is very welcoming and supporting. 
We appreciate your hospitality and excellent service and we will definitely come back here next time.
data.title: Outstanding vacation. Thank you üôèüèº

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Ms. Julia,

Thank you so much for sharing your wonderful review with Adagio Premium the Palm.
We are glad to know that you had a wonderful holiday with us and liked the room cleanliness, beach facility and most especially we are delighted to know that were pleased with our hospitality. 
Adagio Premium The Palm. We strive to create a warm and welcoming atmosphere for all of our guests, we are so glad that you were able to experience that during your stay with us. Thank you for considering in coming back. Words like these inspire us to do better and improve our overall facilities and services. 

Regards,
Hani Essmat
Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Norhaina  Khalid

data.text:
A wonderful hotel! Everything is clean, there is a private beach 50 m away, there is a shuttle bus to the Outlet mall. The staff is very helpful! Abu is very attentive and helpful. We will definitely come back.
Checked in at 11 a.m. and allowed to leave at 2 p.m.
data.title: Excellent accommodation option

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Ms. Ilona,

Thank you for your wonderful feedback about your stay with us we are extremely happy to know that you liked our hotel, location, and thank you for highlighting the services provided by our amazing team members particularly Abu, who gladly assist you during your stay. 
We strive to make sure our guests have the best possible stay and are delighted that we were able to provide you with such an enjoyable experience. Thank you for choosing us!

It is our pleasure in serving you and we are excited in seeing you again soon. 

Regards,
Hani Essmat
Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Norhaina  Khalid
